channel.title: Text above npc's head when no one talk!:?!?! help!
channel.description:
hey guys, i have a small problem. i have a source that has no npcs talking in it
i wanna make some of them talk wat's the code i have to add into npchandler.java for a specific npc to say something?
if someone could just post the code below it would be greatly appreciated, thanx
